pages.text: Just like $(spell)Spells$(), as you explore the world and find $(l:kingdomkeys:blox/prize)those cubes$() we mentioned before, you can also find $(item)Form Orbs.$() These orbs can be used with a press of the $(k:minecraft:key_key.use) $(thing)[$(k:minecraft:key.use)]-Button$() to learn the form.

Using your Drive Gauge, located at the bottom right hand corner of your screen, above your HP bar, you can transform into one of 5 different forms that all have their own abilities, play styles and movement options to learn. These forms are known as Valor, Wisdom, Master, Limit and Final form.
